entity.name: connection_of_individual_product_with_involvements
entity.description: A connection_of_individual_product_with_involvements is a type of connection_of_individual_product and a product_as_individual. It is defined so that instances of product_as_individual can be involved in a connection.

entity.name: involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection
entity.description:
An involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection is a type of product_definition_formation_relationship that is an
Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection. (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: related_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: a product_as_individual that is used to make the connection.
